channel.title: Admins? mods?
channel.description: how do i add admins and mods? im a testscape user i tried edit the client.java to fit it bu it wont work

item.title: Admins? mods?
item.dc:creator: @Drew_Scape Drew_Scape
item.description:
@Drew_Scape wrote:

[quote=“isaac2k4, post:5, topic:4960”]go to the characters file and edit it there.

1 = mod
2= admin
3= owners
4 = hidden owner/admin[/quote] Your real explanitory now rnt ya? Well go into charachter file right click then “edit” then in wordpad or notepad or microsoft dont matter just if u can edit it. press ctrl+f and put in Rights That should bring your 5-10 lines down. Now at the end of the string is a number usually its 0. Change to what the dude up there said and walah! But if your using Frugoo Scape… well run the server go to “configure” and down to “edit administraitor or moderator” There are two and then it should come up with a empty text file thats blank then type in your username and “save” YOUR DONE! then turn off srver. Compile… restart and there you go! All done

Read full topic

item.title: Admins? mods?
item.dc:creator: @isaac2k4 isaac2k4
item.description:
@isaac2k4 wrote:

go to the characters file and edit it there.

1 = mod
2= admin
3= owners
4 = hidden owner/admin

item.title: Admins? mods?

item.description:
@Rayman266 wrote:

Humm… look for //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

And edit whats under there…and remeber to compile oh and when your rights is at 3 YOU cant see ur crown but otheres can
